author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chennai Corporation conservancy workers on Thursday staged a ‘gherao’ at the Chennai Corporation’s unit 13 office, preventing two assistant executive engineers from leaving the office. They were demanding proper payment of wages by conservancy inspectors.

The workers prevented Assistant Executive Engineers Abu Bakar and Mohan from leaving the unit 13 office on Shanmugam Street in ward no. 55, Seven Wells.

The workers continued their protest late into the night.

They alleged that officials were unable to prevent the misconduct of some of their colleagues in Royapuram zone.
title: Conservancy workers gherao engineers demanding wages
